meaningMnemonic: The <radical>loiter</radical>ing <radical>mountain</radical> <radical>king</radical> who hangs around during <radical>winter</radical> to provide an indication (this kanji uses the "indication" kanji as its top 2/3rds) of things to come now looks into your <radical>heart</radical>, and only sees bad things. So, he <kanji>chastise</kanji>s you about it.
readingMnemonic: Why is he chastising you, really, though? He foretold Mrs. Chou coming back in a previous mnemonic, but you saved Mrs. Chou on the beach (once again, in a previous mnemonic), so you could have prevented her second coming. He is <kanji>chastis</kanji>ing you for saving Mrs. <reading>Chou</reading> (ちょう).
